Uses of Class
stev.kwikemart.StoreException

    • Uses of StoreException in stev.kwikemart

      Subclasses of StoreException in stev.kwikemart 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AmountException
      Generic exception thrown for items that have a problem with their amount.
      static class  AmountException.AmountTooLargeException
      Exception that indicates that an item has an amount that exceeds the maximum allowed by the register.
      static class  AmountException.NegativeAmountException
      Exception that indicates that an item has a negative amount.
      class  CouponException
      Generic exception thrown for items that are coupons.
      static class  CouponException.InvalidCouponQuantityException
      Exception that indicates that a coupon has been entered with a quantity that is not equal to one.
      class  InvalidQuantityException
      Exception signaling that an item has an invalid quantity.
      static class  InvalidQuantityException.InvalidQuantityForCategoryException
      Exception that indicates that the quantity of an item is not possible for that category.
      class  InvalidUpcException
      Exception singaling that an item in the list has an invalid UPC code
      static class  InvalidUpcException.InvalidCheckDigitException
      Exception that indicates that the check digit of the UPC does not match with the other digits of the code.
      static class  InvalidUpcException.InvalidDigitException
      Exception that indicates that one of the characters in a UPC is not a digit (0-9).
      static class  InvalidUpcException.NoUpcException
      Exception that indicates that the UPC is the empty string.
      static class  InvalidUpcException.UpcTooLongException
      Exception that indicates that the UPC is too long.
      static class  InvalidUpcException.UpcTooShortException
      Exception that indicates that the UPC is too short.
      class  ItemException
      Generic type of exception thrown when a problem occurs with an item in the list.
      class  PaperRollException
      Generic exception thrown by the usage of the paper roll.
      static class  PaperRollException.OutOfPaperException
      Exception signaling that the paper roll has run out of paper.
      static class  Register.DuplicateItemException
      Exception signaling that the same item UPC is to be entered twice.
      static class  Register.NoPaperRollException
      Exception signaling that the register does not have a paper roll.
      static class  Register.NoSuchItemException
      Exception signaling that an item with a negative quantity is to be entered while no such item appears before in the list.
      class  RegisterException
      Generic type of exception thrown when a problem occurs with the register.
      static class  RegisterException.EmptyGroceryListException
      Exception that indicates that a grocery list is empty.
      static class  RegisterException.TooManyItemsException
      Exception that indicates that a grocery list has more than 10 items.
      Methods in stev.kwikemart that throw StoreException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String Register.print(java.util.List<Item> list)
      Prints a receipt from a list of items.
